name: Tri-development Center of Aiken County, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Tri-development Center of Aiken County, Inc. is a Psychologist, Adult Development & Aging provider based in Aiken, SC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $39.6M in Medicaid payments across 259K claims.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This is a government entity that may serve as a fiscal agent for large populations. Government providers often bill at high volumes due to the scale of public programs they administer.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $39.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
